definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

sentences.english: And his opposite person seemed to be also to feel that the Yin breeze thins out gradually.
sentences.chinese: 而他对面的人似乎也感觉到了阴风逐渐变得稀少。

sentences.english: The chilly wind bleak, staged a thrilling scene of supernatural events.
sentences.chinese: 阴风惨淡的港府，上演着一幕幕惊心动魄的灵异事件。

sentences.english: The wind in the reeds and the rushes.
sentences.chinese: 芦苇和灯心草中的阴风。

sentences.english: After apart Wang Sheng, evil wind blast, month of black clouds block.
sentences.chinese: 分开王生后，阴风阵阵，乌云遮月。

sentences.english: All of a sudden, a burst of Yin breeze once blows, the flame on the night star hand suddenly got dark.
sentences.chinese: 忽然之间，一阵阴风吹过，夜星手上的火苗忽然变暗。

sentences.english: Feel this suddenly huge prosperous Yin breeze, this person's facial expression eventually changed.
sentences.chinese: 感受着这突然大盛的阴风，这人脸色终于变了。

sentences.english: But by other rumors he shall be dishonored.
sentences.chinese: 但是一阵阴风吹来，他的名誉又被伤害。

definition: in Daoism, astral wind on which immortals may ride/strong wind
sound of the wind blowing or rain falling
